💸 THE RIP – Official Trailer (2026) | Crime Thriller Movie
When a score turns deadly, trust becomes the ultimate weapon. The Rip is the edgy new crime thriller from Netflix featuring Ben Affleck and Matt Damon — a high-stakes heist where love for the law crashes head-first into loyalty’s darkest corner.
